======================
sc_buildout template
======================

Use paster::

    >>> paster('create -t portal_buildout buildout --no-interactive')
    paster create -t portal_buildout buildout --no-interactive
    ...

Let's check the content::

    >>> package_dir = os.path.join('buildout')
    >>> ls(package_dir)

    base.cfg
    bootstrap.py
    desenvolvimento.cfg
    homologa.cfg
    products
    sources.cfg
    src
    var
